title: Hail Satan?
description:
Tig and Cheryl take an elevator down from the heights of "Jesus Camp" to talk about "Hail Satan?", a Hulu doc about the Satanic Temple, a tongue in cheek organization that advocates for various causes through satan-worshipping. Glass eyes, devil horns, baphomets and more all get the Tig and Cheryl treatment on a hellishly hilarious episode of True Story! *this episode spills beans* get True Story merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
